column2: Breasts as flat as a board that don't even fill an A cup.
Breasts about the size of an egg that equates to an A cup size.
Breasts about the size of an apple that equates to a cup size ranging from B to C.
Breasts about the size of a grapefruit that equates to a cup size ranging from D to E.
Breasts about the size of pineapple that equates to about a F cup size.
Knockers about the size of a cantaloupe that equates to about a G cup size.
Knockers about the size of a watermelon that equates to cup size of H and above.
This little guy is three inches or shorter in length.
A dick that runs around 4-5 inches in length.
Your typical penis, running around 6-7 inches long.
An impressive cock that is around 8-9 inches long.
An intimidating specimen that is about 10-11 inches long.
This beast a solid foot in length.
A true monster, coming in at 14 or more inches long.
An extremely female looking hermaphrodite. Prone to being oversexed, though typically not fertile.
A pretty male who can pass as a female with the right clothing. Some have found ways to have breasts.
One who could claim to be the fairest of them all.
Two different colored iris's, viewed to be signs of the supernatural or spiritual.
Cursed by magic, now a frog.
Publicly known to enjoy sex with beasts.
You gain energy through rituals of pleasure.
You've the blood of oversexed demons flowing through you.
One of the first vampires, it has lived centuries and is a master of deception.
The result of a mixed union between Vampires and Humans.
Influenced greatly by the lunar cycles, they struggle for control against the beast within.
A werewolf that has lived for a century and has grown into a fearsome combatant.
The result of a mixed union between Werewolves and Humans.
Your blood pulses with divine energy from the heavens themselves.
A rarity to be seen. Most have died or moved on from our earthly realm, over to the lands of the fae.
They're a primitive, bestial species of legend. Not seen in centuries, most believe them to never have existed.
A fox person from the far east. Naturally intelligent and enjoys a good prank.
A cat person from the far east. Often arbitrary, yet potentially very friendly and supportive.
One of the fae, known to be able to grow to human size, while others claim they're just part fae.
A mysterious race, believed to be an extremely rare strain of lycanthropy, or perhaps related to the fae.

A person who trades their body for personal gain.
A Whore who has the fame to be more selective and expensive with who receives services.
A whore who can charge more thanks to their skill level.
A whore who lacks the skill or prestige to charge more.
One of the few who escaped the business on their own terms.
A person who has been trained to combat supernatural threats.
You've been marked for life. All shall know you as a slave.
Acknowledged by all to not have laid with another.
Horses under your command are more aggressive and brave.
Heroes stand against villains and often stand as examples of truth and justice.
Villains conflict against heroes and are often guided by greed or pure ambition.
This person has impressive hand-eye coordination, response time and flexibility.
This person is prone to tripping, dropping things, or similar inconveniences, due to a lack of coordination.
Allows one to see a persons desires, fears, and tweak them accordingly, potentially breaking the target.
Their mind broken, they can't resist the directions of one with Mind Control.
Symbiote or tentacle-kin are people born with, or possessed by a parasitic entity. Seen as unnatural, most keep the affliction hidden.
Represents any kind of unnatural power dwelling within a person that they've a measure of control over.
Can take a beating. A stronger version of sturdy, which can also stack with robust instead of being an opposite of it.
Not entirely human, this person is also bound with an animal spirit, allowing the opportunity for shapeshifting.
The spirit of the hyena exists within this person.
Unholy blood courses through this person's veins.
The spirit of the dog exists within this person.
The spirit of the horse exists within this person.
The spirit of the wolf exists within the person.
A practitioner of the arcane, who often finds themselves outside of society.
The blood of orcs flows through this person's veins.
The blood of elves flows through this person's veins.
The blood of the fae (fairies and their ilk) flows through this person's veins.
A person with supernatural power and knowledge, who has been forced into a role of servitude.
Said to be a cross between demon and therianthrope, this being requires blood for sustenance.
The blood of the divine courses through this person's veins.
The spirit of the cat exists within the person.
The blood of a Nymph flows through this person's veins.
The blood of a Fox Spirit (Kitsune) flows through this person's veins.
The blood of a Dragon is said to flow through this person's veins.
This person has taken some time away from the burdens of court to do a little adventuring.
